resource: 1003283.type=FIO 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.alacarte=false 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.msrp=2300 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.title=SE Preferred Package 1003283.source=NVS 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.description=SE Preferred Package: includes Blind Spot Monitor (BSM) [bsm] with Rear Cross-Traffic Alert (RCTA), [rcta] Smart Key System [smart_key_system] on all doors with Push Button Start and remote illuminated entry, chrome-accented outside door handles with touch-sensor lock/unlock feature, power tilt/slide moonroof with sunshade, Driver Easy Speak, and Entune™ Premium Audio with Navigation [nav_system_xm] and App Suite [entune] — includes the Entune™ Multimedia Bundle [entune_tm] (7-in. high-resolution touch-screen with split-screen display, AM/FM CD player with MP3/WMA playback capability, six speakers, auxiliary audio jack, USB 2.0 port [usb] with iPod® [ipod] connectivity and control, advanced voice recognition, [adv_voice_recognition] hands-free phone capability, phone book access and music streaming [bluetooth_streaming] via Bluetooth® [bluetooth] wireless technology), Entune® App Suite, [entune] HD Radio™, [hd_radio] HD predictive traffic and Doppler weather overlay, AM/FM cache radio, SiriusXM All Access Radio [siriusxm] with 3-month complimentary trial, Gracenote® album cover art, and integrated backup camera display [camera] 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.derived=false 1003283.vtc=true 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.package=true 1003283.1002622.1000866.1000941.vtc=true
